Azure Managed Grafana Test Knowledge Base

This is a test knowledge base for integration testing. It contains information about Azure Managed Grafana features:

Key Features:
- Fully managed Grafana service
- Built-in Azure Active Directory integration
- High availability with 99.9% SLA
- Auto-scaling capabilities

Pricing:
- Essential Tier for small teams
- Standard Tier for enterprise use

Data Sources:
- Azure Monitor integration
- Azure Data Explorer support
- Custom REST APIs

Security:
- Azure AD authentication
- Role-based access control
- Private endpoint support
- Multi-factor authentication

This content is used for testing search functionality and MCP protocol compliance.
